category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA104_mapping_create_not_existing_cad
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible enable/suppress the creation in the AutoCAD file of missing custom attributes mapped with master=cad directive. The creation of missing cad-mapped custom attributes in the AutoCAD file takes place upon save operations. By default missing cad-mapped custom attributes are created in the AutoCAD file. Possible values: 0 - suppress the creation of missing cad-mapped custom attributes 1 - enable the creation of missing cad-mapped custom attributes (Default)
